name: Varies
description: Placeholder for charateristic for Trade Skill

name: Weapon Skill
description: Represents your character's skill in hand-to-hand combat, both with weapons and without.

name: Ballistic Skill
description: Represents your character's skill with missile weapons, such as bows, crossbows, and pistols.

name: Strength
description: Represents your character's muscle and brawn.

name: Toughness
description: Represents your character's ability to withstand injury, disease, and poison.

name: Agility
description: Represents physical quickness, manual dexterity, and reaction speed.

name: Intelligence
description: Represents your character's intellect, insight, and ability to reason.

name: Will Power
description: Represents your character's mental toughness and resolve.

name: Fellowship
description: Represents your character's personal charisma and social skills.

name: Attacks
description: Represents the quickness of your character's attacks and indicates the maximum number of attacks you can make in 10 seconds.

name: Wounds
description: Represents your character's general vitality and how much damage they can suffer before becoming critically injured.

name: Strength Bonus
description: Derived from Strength. Used when inflicting damage in melee combat.

name: Toughness Bonus
description: Derived from Toughness. Used to resist damage.

name: Movement
description: Represents your character's base land speed.

name: Insanity Points
description: Represents the state of your character's sanity. PCs begin with 0 but can gain them due to horrific experiences or grievous wounds.

name: Fate Points
description: Represents luck and, to an extent, your character's destiny. Can be used to avoid certain death.
